channel.title: Java problems
channel.description:
hey
i did update my java to 1.6.0_18 and now my source run.bat wont work any more same thing as the compiler any source run bat wont work with me any more. and i did try download jdk 6_21 it says its alredy downloaded but i never havent downloaded it before. same thing is as the jre. people please help me

item.title: Java problems
item.dc:creator: @fac3fin2 fac3fin2
item.description:
@fac3fin2 wrote:

run.bat doesnt work java cant see that as command or something like that whats wrong with it?

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:363077”]Make sure you have uninstalled ALL Previous JDK versions

And your run.bat does not need jdk

Replace your run.bat with this code see if it works

[quote]@echo off
title ServerName Online!
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic
